experience.title: ÂµSaaS Modules
highlights: nomy.HOME - Easily engage and empower your community. Load balance traffic by creating a splash page landing or homepage that is optimized for every user. No code needed.
nomy.ERP - Easily create and manage your e-commerce business. Accept orders, manage products and sell online using your very own storefront in minutes. No code needed.
nomy.TUBE - Easily promote and sell your goods and services. Notify subscribers, manage playlists, and showcase videos using your very own catalog in minutes. No code needed.
nomy.DESK - Easily create and manage your productized service. Accept monthly subscription plans, manage tasks and communicate using your very own client area in minutes. No code needed.
nomy.IMS - Easily host a peer 2 peer chat service. Instantly accept and receive personal messages over websockets and via notifications when offline. No code needed.

experience.title: Innovation Management System (IMS)
highlights: Advanced idea tracking and management system. Goal set out to be a better WHMCS built for deploying websites and applications for ideas. A website that allows user's to create websites using no code.

As a full stack developer I was able to get the application running in a SaaS enviornment, setup member authentication, programmed business logic, and coded many forms, lists, and master-detail pages.

Project failed because of lack of marketing, mental health reasons, and then finally lack of overall interest; MVP was not reached mostly because my focus shifted to working on a new programming language and ERP.
